metadata.name: Inkscape 01
metadata.description:
Inkscapes: Algorithmic Dreams                          

A collaboration between Swickie x Kenny Vaden combining code & analog media.     

This hypnotizing video art project integrates the graceful motion of ink flows and reactive generative landscapes that burst with colorful patterns. The generative landscapes include three basic forms that appear to move with motion parallax, sample colors into rapidly changing layered circles, or trap the ink flow between polygon tiles.                                       

Debuted at OtherBlock: SuperCharged LA, March 18, 2023.
